SongLyrics.JpnStr: 走[はし]り出[だ]せればほら 掴[つか]めるから
SongLyrics.EngStr: If you start running, you'll be able to catch it

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 一度[いちど]離[はな]した 明日[あした]へのチケット
SongLyrics.EngStr: Once you let go, it's your ticket to tomorrow

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 此[こ]の場所[ばしょ]から 始[はじ]まるから
SongLyrics.EngStr: Because it starts from this place

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 取[と]り戻[もど]すため もう一度[いちど]リセット
SongLyrics.EngStr: To get it back, reset it again

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 改札[かいさつ]を出[で]て 目[め]に移[うつ]るサンセット
SongLyrics.EngStr: As I exit the ticket gate, I see the sunset.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: オレンジ色[いろ]が 滲[にじ]んで見[み]えて
SongLyrics.EngStr: The orange blurs my vision

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 流[なが]す涙[なみだ]を 静[しず]かに照[て]らして
SongLyrics.EngStr: The tears I shed are silently illuminated

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 帰かえる場所[ばしょ]だって 言[い]ってる気[き]がして
SongLyrics.EngStr: I feel like you're saying it's a place I can return to

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 並[なら]んで歩[ある]くほどに 人[ひと]と比[くら]べてばかり
SongLyrics.EngStr: The more we walk side by side, the more we compare ourselves to others

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何時[いつ]の間[ま]にか背伸[せの]びして 強[つよ]がる自[じ]分[ぶん]に気[き]づく
SongLyrics.EngStr: Before I know it, I realize I'm getting taller and stronger

SongLyrics.EngStr: If you can start running, you'll be able to grab it

SongLyrics.EngStr: Once I let go, my ticket to tomorrow

SongLyrics.EngStr: Because it starts from this place

SongLyrics.EngStr: To get it back, reset it again

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 過去[かこ]に縛[しば]られ 枷[かせ]を引[ひ]きずって
SongLyrics.EngStr: Bound by the past, dragged down by the shackles

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 身動[みうご]きとれなくなって仕[し]舞[ま]った
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm stuck in the past

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 消[き]えて忘[わす]れて仕[し]舞[ま]いたいなんて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to disappear and be forgotten

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 被害者[ひがいしゃ]ぶって逃[に]げていた丈[だけ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: I was just running away, just playing the victim

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何時[いつ]もより緩[ゆる]い風呂[ふろ]の中[なか]で自問自答[じもんじとう]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Asking myself questions in a bath that's looser than usual

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 悩[なや]んでいた事[こと]なんて ちっぽけな事[こと]だったんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: What I was worrying about was just a small thing

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 挫[くじ]けそうな時[とき]は 立[た]ち止[ど]まって
SongLyrics.EngStr: When I feel like I'm failing, I stop and

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 見[み]つめ直[なお]して 自分[じぶん]らしさへ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Look again and become yourself

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 諦[あきら]めない心[こころ]を掴[つか]め
SongLyrics.EngStr: Grab the heart that won't give up

SongLyrics.JpnStr: また最初[さいしょ]から もう一度[いちど]リセット
SongLyrics.EngStr: Start all over again and reset

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 色[いろ]んな事[こと]を大[おお]袈[げ]裟[さ]にして
SongLyrics.EngStr: You exaggerate so many things

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 優[やさ]しい心[こころ]なくし傷[きず]つけ
SongLyrics.EngStr: You'll lose your kind heart and hurt yourself

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 自[じ]分[ぶん]が一番[いちばん]可愛[かわい]くなって
SongLyrics.EngStr: I've become the prettiest person I know

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 気付[きづ]けば今[いま]はひとりぽっちで
SongLyrics.EngStr: And now I find myself all alone

SongLyrics.JpnStr: また明日[あした]から 笑[わら]い合[あ]えるよう
SongLyrics.EngStr: So that we can start laughing again tomorrow

SongLyrics.JpnStr: まずはここから 変[か]えられるよう
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to change things from here

SongLyrics.EngStr: Once I let go, the ticket to tomorrow

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 取[と]り戻[もど]すため もう一度[いちど]リセット
SongLyrics.EngStr: To get it back, reset it again

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 広[ひろ]がる世界[せかい]は 僕[ぼく]丈[だけ]のものさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: The world that opens up is mine alone

SongLyrics.JpnStr: もう一度[いちど] 取[と]り戻[もど]すリセット
SongLyrics.EngStr: Resetting to get it back again

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 踏[ふ]み出[だ]す力[ちから]が 僕[ぼく]を満[み]たすから
SongLyrics.EngStr: Because the power to step forward fills me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: もう一度[いちど] 走[はし]り出[だ]すスタート
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll start running again
